title: Kona: Day One (Patch 2.5.0.7) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "patch_kona_day_one_2.5.0.7.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Change log:
Patch 20160223 (24 February 2016)
This version brings the first version of the Journal. It contains the General Store location cases and some objectives, but is still being worked on.
Notable changes
Important notes
Default settings now set to "Medium". You may have to re-tweak your settings.
If the game crashes at loading try disabling "Preloading" in the Graphics settings.
You may have a better experience restarting a game if you want to test the Journal without bugs
New settings
Added "Preloading" in order to workaround memory crashes on some machines. This is temporary.
Added "Vsync". Set to 30 FPS if you machine can't go further than 45.
User interface
Switches now have captions binded to them; clearer now.
Notifications now tells when visibility is bad
Notifications now tells when the game saves
Journal
Revamped Objectives Panel: still WIP, but now displays your main objectives.
Revamped Locations Panel: still WIP, but now displays location-bases objectives.
Optimizations
New engine version helps with lighting performance
Further tweaked quality settings for more controls
Plus dozens of small bug fixes and minor tweaks. THANKS to everyone who reported bugs :)
Known Major Issues / WIP Features
Only TWO visions/ghosts to find. IT IS NORMAL for beta :)
Initial loading is still really long. Working on it.
The game takes a lot of memory. Working on it.
Camera rotation may sometimes be too limited, use "Read" (F)
Some texts are temporary
IF THE GAME CRASHES, DISABLE "PRELOADING" IN GRAPHICS SETTINGS
Planned for next update
More locations in the journal
More picture interactors
Characters and Photos sections revamps in the Journal
Improved flow of the General Store
Revamped captions interactors
New map overlay to make exploration more enjoyable.
French voice
More optimizations YEAH!
